dgantt
Interface RowRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRowRenderer
public interface RowRenderer

Renderer for drawing the background of a Gantt chart. The area rendered by these to methods overlap, with paintBackground invoked prior to paintRows.

Method Summary
 void paintBackground(java.awt.Graphics g, GanttChart chart)
          Renders the background of the Gantt chart.
 void paintRow(java.awt.Graphics g, GanttChart chart, int row, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds, boolean isTable)
          Renders the background of a single row in the Gantt chart.
 

Method Detail

paintBackground

void paintBackground(java.awt.Graphics g,
                     GanttChart chart)
Renders the background of the Gantt chart. This is called prior to any paintRow invocations.

Parameters:
g - the graphics object used for rendering
chart - the Gantt chart

paintRow

void paintRow(java.awt.Graphics g,
              GanttChart chart,
              int row,
              java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds,
              boolean isTable)
Renders the background of a single row in the Gantt chart.

Parameters:
g - the graphics object used for rendering
chart - the Gantt chart
row - the index of the row
bounds - the rectangular bounds of the row
isTable - true if this is rendering the background in a GanttTable; false if rendering the background in a GanttChart
